title: Listen to framework compilation improvements
body:
- [ ] If a contract is compiled from default_workspace, in Udap, it shows `CONTRACT (Compiled by Remix)`. Then when another contract is selected, Udapp still shows that:

![Screenshot 2022-10-03 at 6 32 31 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/193583108-b1a20f5a-d404-4ba5-ab35-023b6c037544.png)

- [ ] With Hardhat connection, file selected in editor does not change file selected in UDapp dropdown

![Screenshot 2022-10-03 at 6 34 55 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/193583543-c28e2ada-9040-40d7-bec4-c7ff547bb1f9.png)

- [x] #2976

![Screenshot 2022-10-03 at 6 37 21 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/193583999-7c4cf81e-fa2d-42d8-ade1-1f18a6515553.png)

- [ ] If a contract from hardhat project is compiled using Remix, in Udapp it looks fine. But when a different file is selected in the editor, it shows two files in UDapp dropdown, whereas second i.e. Greeter2.sol is not compiled using Remix.

![Screenshot 2022-10-03 at 6 39 03 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/193584346-e7cbd1b0-71fa-44c3-9941-543dce393f44.png)

- [ ] #2988
- [x] When connected to Foundry, if a contract is renamed in a file and compiled using `forge`, it shows previous names of contract in the Udapp dropdown.

![Screenshot 2022-10-03 at 6 49 10 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/193588064-f5d76e5d-ef95-4bcc-9a94-29f266150b0b.png)

- [ ] It does this when a contract is compiled using Remix and then other file, whose contract name was updated, is selected

![Screenshot 2022-10-03 at 6 54 04 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/193588682-cff3c7d3-f835-4dd6-bb7a-703f14179ee3.png)
